00032 using namespace Hypertable;

00034 uint8_t *CellCachePool::get_buf(size_t sz) {
00035   m_cur_buf = new BufNode(sz, m_pre_buf);
00036   if (!m_cur_buf || !m_cur_buf->m_buf) {
00037     return NULL;
00038   }
00039   m_total_allocated += sz + sizeof(BufNode);
00040   Global::memory_tracker.add(sz + sizeof(BufNode));
00041   m_pre_buf = m_cur_buf;
00042 
00043   m_head_ptr = m_cur_buf->m_buf;
00044   m_tail_ptr = m_cur_buf->m_buf + sz;
00045 
00046   return m_head_ptr;
00047 }
00048 
00049 CellCachePool::~CellCachePool() {
00050   pool_free();
00051   Global::memory_tracker.subtract(m_total_allocated);
00052 }
